title: AMERICAN MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY OFFER
short_desc: Enjoy Two Adult Super Saver Tickets for the American Museum of Natural History with this NYC package.
long_desc:
Enjoy an adventurous day at the American Museum of Natural History this winter.

This promotion applies to reservations made exclusively on our website at Flexible Rate and cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. 

Enjoy Two Adult Super Saver Tickets for the American Museum of Natural History and two NYC themed mugs as a memento of your stay at the WJ Hotel with this NYC package.

Details:

  • Admission to the American Museum of Natural History
  • Admission to the Rose Center for Earth and Space
  • Admission to Hayden Planetarium Space Show
  • Admission to Special Exhibits
  • Admission to LeFrak Theater films
  • Admission to IMAX Film
  • Receive two NYC themed mugs as a memento of your stay at the Washington Jefferson Hotel.

Terms and Conditions:

  • Offer available until March 1, 2017
  • Two tickets issued per room, per reservation.
  • Cannot be combined with any other specials or promotions.
  • 2 nights minimum stay is required.
  • Additional tickets available – ask front desk upon arrival.
page_title: Manhattan Hotel Deals | Manhattan Hotel Deals | WJ Hotel
meta_content: Browse our Manhattan hotel deals at the WJ Hotel to plan your getaway for the best value. Book our Manhattan hotel packages.
